texts.es:
Rosa es socia del Banco Comunal Bienestar.
Rosa es soltera, tiene 23 años y vive con sus padres, Rosa junto a su mama tienen un bar en su casa en donde venden bebidas, además tienen una tienda de abarrotes en general. Rosa esta estudiando cosmetología y tiene proyectado implementar su salón de belleza.
Rosa necesita un préstamo de 1050 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de materiales y muebles para su salón de belleza.
Los sueños de Rosa son ahorrar para el futuro y estudiar otra profesión.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the Bienestar communal bank. She is single, 23 years old and lives with her parents. Rosa, along with her mother, has a bar in their house in which they sell drinks. In addition, they have a general grocery store. Rosa is studying cosmetology and is planning to set up her own beauty salon. Rosa needs a loan of 1050 Soles, which will be invested in the purchase of materials and furniture for her beauty salon. Rosa's dreams are saving for the future and studying another profession.

Translated from Spanish by Donald Allen, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of materials and furniture for her beauty salon

loans.name: Agustina

texts.es: Agustina es una mujer D. 47 años muy trabajadora y decidida, vive en su propia casa junto a sus 2 hijas; Eva D. 17 y Paola D. 11 a quienes desea dar una mejor vida. Ella tiene un puesto D. venta D. ropa en el mercado Laykakota (mercado importante D. la ciudad D. Puno), el cual es muy concurrido por sus clientes, ya que siempre encuentran prendas novedosas, ella es una vendedora muy cortés, siempre recibe a las personas con una sonrisa en los labios. Lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y lo que más le gusta es vender, Agustina espera en el futuro tener una tienda más granD. donD. pueda vender una mayor cantidad D. ropa y pueda atender mejor a sus clientes, y unas D. las cosas que menos le gusta D. su trabajo es tener que permanecer todo el día dentro D. su puesto, sin poder salir a la calle, aun así ella quiere seguir para adelante y cumplir sus sueños. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo y está dispuesta a hacerlo, en su banco comunal es una socia muy respetada por la responsabilidad que demuestra. Con los 700 soles que solicita planea incrementar la mercadería que tiene en su puesto D. venta.
texts.en:
Agustina is a very determined and hardworking woman, 47 years old. She lives in her own house with her 2 daughters; Eva is 17 and Paola is 11. She wants to give them a better life. She has a clothing stand at the Laykakota market (a large market in Puno), which is very popular with her customers, who can always find new items.

Agustina is a very polite salesperson, she always greets customers with a smile. She has been doing this job for 20 years, and what she enjoys most is selling. She hopes to one day have a larger store where she can offer a greater quantity of clothes and better assist her customers. What she likes least about the job is having to stay at the stand all day, without being able to go outsiD.. However, she wants to continue her work to achieve her dreams.

This is her first loan from MFP. She knows that she has to make all of her payments on time, and she is dedicated to doing so. She is a respected member of her communal bank because of the responsibility she demonstrates. With the 700 soles that she is requesting she plans to increase the merchandise available at her stand.

Translated from Spanish by Kristen Beck, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase merchandise

loans.name: Zuhrohon

texts.ru: Зухрохон 43 года, замужем и имеет 4 детей. Вместе со своей старшей дочерью она занимается куплей продажей зелени на центральном рынке города Исфары. Опыт Зухрохон в этой деятельности более 2 лет и можно сказать что прибыль получаемая ею целиком зависит от распределения денежных средств ее бизнеса, так как зелень товар скоропортящийся и отслеживание спроса на ту или иную категорию зелени приносит максимальную прибыль. За товаром Зухрохон ездит сама, а дочь в это время торгует. Зухрохон собирается немного увеличить количество товара и поэтому решила подать заявку на займ в КИВА.
texts.en:
Zuhrohon is 43 years old, married and has four children. Together with her oldest daughter she buys and sells greens on the central market of the town of Isfara. Zuhrohon has more than two years experience in this business and it's fair to say that the profit which she receives entirely depends on the distribution of the business capital because greens do not have a long shelf life and by keeping close watch on the demand for one or another type of greens returns a maximum profit. Zuhrohon travels to buy the product herself and her daughter stays to do the sales. Zuhrohon plans to increase the volume of goods a little bit and this is why she decided to apply for a loan at Kiva.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To expand business

loans.name: Orgalidia Milagros

texts.es:
Milagros es socia del Banco Comunal Bienestar.
Milagros es conviviente, tiene 27 años y estudio pedagogía, Milagros vende cosméticos por catálogos que ofrece a amigos y familiares, además Milagros vende ropa y calzados variados a pedido, sus ventas son al crédito.
Milagros necesita un préstamo de 900 soles  dinero que será invertido en la compra de zapatillas.
Los sueños de Milagros son obtener su titulo y tener una tienda de ropa.
texts.en:
Milagros is a member of the Bienestar Banco Comunal.

Milagros is 27 years old, lives with her significant other, and is studying teaching. She sells makeup through catalogs that she offers to friends and family. In addition, Milagros sells clothes and footwear by request, her sales are made on credit.

Milagros needs a loan of 900 soles, which will be invested in buying shoes.

Milagros's dream is to earn her degree and have a clothing store.

Translated from Spanish by Kristen Beck, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase shoes

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: Alicia es una mujer muy tranquila y trabajadora, tiene 57 años y vive en la casa D. su familia, lo que más quiere es salir adelante y progresar en su negocio. La vida D. Alicia siempre ha sido muy solitaria, desD. que cumplió la mayoría D. edad (18 años), trabajó haciendo todo lo que pudo para mantenerse por sí sola y no depender D. sus padres. Actualmente se dedica a la venta D. instrumentos odontológicos, los cuales lleva a vender a las ciudades D. La paz y Cochabamba (ciudades del país D. Bolivia). Para Alicia el negocio que realiza es muy rentable, ya que tiene muchos clientes, y lo que más le gusta es viajar, lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad, lo que considera más complicado es transportar los instrumentos odontológicos, puesto que se tiene que hacer con mucho cuidado. Alicia desea más adelante tener una tienda en el país D. Bolivia donD. pueda vender con más comodidad, puesto que actualmente lo hace sólo a pedido. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, y está muy feliz D. la oportunidad D. obtenerlo, en su banco comunal es una socia muy solidaria con el resto D. sus compañeras. Con los 600 soles solicitados planea comprar más instrumentos odontológicos para incrementar la cantidad D. su mercadería.
texts.en:
Alicia is a very laid back but hardworking woman. She is 57 years old and lives in her family home. What she wants most is to move forward with her business.

Alicia's life has always been very solitary. Since she turned 18 she has been working to support herself on her own and not depend on her parents.

Currently she works in dental equipment sales in La Paz and Cochabamba (Bolivian cities). Her business is very profitable, she has many clients. What she enjoys most is traveling. She has been doing this work for 4 years. What is most difficult is transporting the equipment, which must be done very carefully.

Alicia would one day like to have a store in Bolivia where she could conduct sales more conveniently, given that currently she sells on request only.

This is Alicia's first loan from MFP, and she is very happy to have this opportunity. She is very close to the other members of her communal bank.

With the 600 soles she has requested, she plans to buy more equipment, to increase her inventory.

Translated from Spanish by Kristen Beck, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase inventory

loans.name: Betty

texts.es: Betty tiene 36 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en la casa de sus padres junto a sus 2 hijos Leydy de 13 y Josué de 6 años a quienes quiere brindarles un mejor futuro. Su día comienza a las 6 de la mañana, cuando abre su puesto de ropa y se alista para empezar a vender su mercadería, tiene su puesto en el mercado Laykakota (mercado importante de la ciudad de Puno), donde atiende durante todo el día, y a las 9 de la noche cierra sabiendo que al día siguiente le espera otra larga jornada de trabajo. Lo que más le gusta de su negocio es conversar con sus vecinas de venta, así se hacen más amenas sus largas jornadas de trabajo, lleva 5 años realizando esta actividad y lo que menos le gusta es tener que permanecer todo el día en su puesto, ya que es la única que lo cuida, aun así sabe que su sacrificio no es en vano y espera tener una tienda más grande donde pueda vender ropa más variada. Este es el primer préstamo de Betty con MFP y sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, en su banco comunal es muy alegre y siempre está al tanto de todos los acuerdos que tienen entre socias. El dinero que solicita lo invertirá en comprar más ropa para incrementar la cantidad de mercadería que tiene en su puesto de venta.
texts.en:
Betty is 36 years old, a very hard worker, and lives in her parents' house with her two children, Josué, who is 6 years old and Leydy, who is 13 years old. Her day starts a 6am, when she opens her clothing stall and gets ready to sell her merchandise. Her stall is in Laykakota, a popular market in the city of Puno, and she works at it all day. Every night, when she closes her stall at 9pm, she knows that the next day she will have to work all day again. She has been working in the market for 5 years now and what she likes best about her work is talking to the women who sell things on either side of her, it really makes the day seem shorter. What she likes the least about her work is having to stay at her stall for so long because she is the only one who works there. Even so, she knows that her sacrifices are not in vain - she is working to give her children a brighter future. She also hopes to expand her business into a store, where she could sell a much larger variety of clothes. This is Betty's first loan from MFP and she knows that she must make her payments responsibly. She likes being a member of her communal bank because everyone is cheerful and they always work to be in agreement about all their decisions. Betty will use this loan to buy merchandise, so that she can sell a larger variety of things from her stall.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Marianela

texts.es:
Marianela es socia del Banco Comunal Palmeras.
Marianela es soltera, tiene 32 años y vive con sus padres, Marianela tiene un restaurante en un local alquilado, la atención es todos los días, atiende eventos y compromisos familiares, los días sábados y domingos vende comida típica. Además Marianela junto a su novio tienen cabinas de Internet.
Marianela necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de carne, arroz, maíz.
Los sueños de Marianela son tener un local propio y tener un hotel.
texts.en:
Marianela is a member of the Palmeras Communal Bank. Marianela is 32 years old, unmarried, and lives with her parents. Marianela has a restaurant in a rented space and works there every day, helping to host events and family occasions, especially on Saturdays and Sundays. She serves traditional local food. Also, Marianela runs an internet cafe with her boyfriend. Marianela needs a loan of 1000 soles, which she will use to buy meat, rice and corn. Marianela dreams of owning her own space and of running a hotel.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy meat, rice and corn

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es: Blanca Estela M. D. C. vive junto a su hija la cual trabaja como maestra y estudia al mismo tiempo en la universidad, también vive junto a su nieta y su hermano el cual trabaja como sastre. Ella posee una pupusería desD. hace 30 años, debe trabajar muy duro ya que es viuda y no recibe ayuda D. nadie, es por ello que cada día se esfuerza por obtener lo necesario para vivir dignamente. Blanca Solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar la materia prima para la elaboración D. pupusas (platillo típico salvadoreño el cual esta hecho a base D. masa D. maíz o arroz, la cual se mezcla con chicharro, queso y frijoles y se le da la forma D. una tortilla). Debido a que esta es su única vía para obtener el dinero necesario para sus gastos, ella desea poder mejorar su negocio y ser la número uno en su colonia y que las personas la prefieran por la calidad D. su servicio, D. manera que sus ventas aumenten.
texts.en:
Blanca Estela M. D. C. lives with her daughter, who works as a teacher while also studying at university. They also live with Blanca's granddaughter and brother, who works as a tailor. For 30 years, Blanca has run a shop that sells pupusas which are corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, beans, and pork, then grilled. She has had to work very hard, especially since she is a widow and cannot rely upon anyone else for support, so every day she strives to make enough to live with dignity. Blanca is asking for a loan so that she can buy the ingredients for her pupusas. It is the only way for her to get enough money to cover her costs. She hopes to increase her sales and improve her business, making it the best in the neighbourhood. She hopes that people will recognize the quality of her service.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy ingredients

location.town: San Rafael Cedros, departamento de Cuscatlán

loans.name: Eberth

texts.es: Eberth tiene 26 años es un joven muy conciente y preocupado, vive en la casa de sus padres a quienes desea dar una vejez tranquila y sabe que trabajado mucho lo logrará. Aunque todavía no ha culminado sus estudios universitarios de Ingeniería Civil, Eberth ya ha decidido que es hora de contribuir en los gastos de su familia, es por eso que con la ayuda de sus padres tiene un negocio de diseño de planos, el cual le da los ingresos necesarios para costearse sus estudios. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que puede ejercer su carrera y ganar dinero a la vez, lleva 3 años en este negocio y lo más difícil para él es tener que dejar de dormir para cumplir un trabajo, aun así sabe que sus esfuerzos tendrán su recompensa y anhela poder culminar sus estudios rápidamente y convertirse en un gran profesional. Eberth se encuentra en su primer préstamo con MFP y tiene el firme compromiso de no fallar en sus pagos y de ser responsable con el resto de las socias de su banco comunal. Con los 500 soles que solicita implementará mejor su lugar de trabajo y podrá atender mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Eberth is 26 years old. He is a very responsible and concerned young man. He lives with his parents, to whom he would like to provide with a decent senior life, and he knows that if he works hard, he will be able to do so. Although he hasn’t finished his Civil Engineering college studies, Eberth has decided that it’s time to contribute to cover the family expenses, and that’s the reason why with the help of his parents his own a plan design business, which gives him the necessary income to cover his college expenses. What he enjoys the most about his job is to be able to practice his skills and make money. At the same time, he’s been working in this business for 3 years and the most difficult part of the work is to lose hours of sleep in order to fulfill his obligations. Still, he knows his efforts will be rewarded and he hopes he will be able to finish school soon so he can become an outstanding professional. This is the first loan Eberth requests to MFP and he is committed not to fail to cover any payments and to be responsible with the rest of the members of the community bank. He will use the 500 soles to make improvements in his work place to provide better care for his customers.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Lopez, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improvement in his work place

loans.name: Abigail

texts.es:
Abigail es socia del Banco Comunal Palmeras.
Abigail es conviviente, tiene 40 años y 2 hijos, Abigail viaja a la selva ayacuchana en donde vende pescado, verduras y de la selva compra frutas variadas que luego transporta en carro alquilado y lo vende en el mercado de abastos de la ciudad de Ayacucho.
Abigail necesita un préstamo de 600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de pollos.
Los sueños de Abigail son comprar una computadora para sus hijos y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Abigail is a member of the Palmeras [Palm trees] Community Bank. She has a common-law husband, is 40 years old and has two children. Abigail travels to the jungle in the Ayacucho region to sell fish and vegetables. While there she also buys various fruits which she then hauls in her rented car and sells in the food market in the city of Ayacucho. Abigail needs a loan of 600 Peruvian soles [about US $ 200], which she will invest in the purchase of chickens. Abigail's dreams are to buy a computer for her children and improve her business.

Translated from Spanish by Todd M. Anderson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of chickens

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru: Дилшод приехал в город Исфару несколько лет назад и стал учеником в одной из многочисленных лепешечных которые выпекают традиционный вид таджикского хлеба – лепешки. Дилщод до приезда имел некоторый опыт в этой деятельности, но постепенно работая по найму усовершенствовал свое мастерство и открыл свою собственную лепешечную. Теперь у него свои работники и кроме этого ему помогает его мать. Его младший брат уже кредитуется в МикроИнвест и, видя его успехи, Дилшод тоже решил подать заявку на займ и собирается прикупить муку и уголь для своей лепешечной.
texts.en:
Dilshod moved to the town of Isfar several years ago and became an apprentice in one of the many bakeries where Tajik traditional bread, lepeshka, is made. Prior to his arrival, Dilshod had some experience in this profession, skills which he honed while drawing a wage from others. He then opened his own bakery. Now he has employees of his own and his mother also helps out. Dilshod's younger brother is already a client of MicroInvest. Seeing his successes, Dilshod also decided to apply for a loan, and he plans to purchase flour and charcoal for his bakery.

Translated from Russian by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of flour and charcoal

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es: la Sra. Alba Luz M. Blandon se dedica al comercio , ella cuenta con un pequeño negocio de venta  de Calzado y Ropa Americana" tiene mas 5 años dedicarse a este tipo de actividad y durante todo este tiempo  le ha ido muy  bien esta casada tiene 2 hijos a los que apoya con los gastos educativos y en el hogar uno de sus sueños es tener una gran tienda  en la que pueda emplear personas y de esta forma contribuir a crear fuentes de empleo ,hay que buscar nuevas alternativas para poder salir adelante , ella es una mujer con un espiritu de superacion, con el credito que me brinden tan prestigiada institucion lograre dar un paso muy importante ya que surtire mas mi negocio. esas fueron las palabras de  doña Albita
texts.en:
Mrs. Alba Luz M. Blandon is a businesswoman. She has a small business selling shoes and American clothing. She has been in this business for more than 5 years, during which time she has had a lot of success. Alba is married and has two children, whom she supports by covering their educational expenses and housing. One of her dreams is to own a large shop where she can hire staff and, in doing so, create employment opportunities. Alba must look for new alternatives to be able to get ahead. She has a strong desire to better herself. According to Alba, she will use the requested loan to make an important step forward by expanding her shop's stock of merchandise.

Translated from Spanish by Todd M. Anderson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of shoes and clothing such as skirts, shirts, trousers, blouses and dresses

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 29 años, es una mujer muy alegre, vive en la casa de su familia junto a su única hija, Maira de 9 años, y lo que más desea es darle una buena vida, aunque para eso tenga que trabajar mucho. Tiene un puesto de venta de juguetes en el mercado San José (mercado importante de la ciudad de Juliaca), ella se siente muy feliz con su negocio, ya que le es muy rentable, lleva realizando esta actividad 2 años y lo que más le gusta es ver el rostro de felicidad que ponen los niños cuando tienen uno de sus juguetes en la mano, ya que siempre le gustaron los niños, es por eso que decidió dedicarse a este trabajo. Elena espera tener en el futuro una tienda más grande donde pueda vender muchos más juguetes, para ello sabe que tiene que trabajar muy duro y sin descanso, considera que lo más difícil de su labor es traer los juguetes desde la ciudad de Tacna (ciudad al sur de Péru, límite con Chile), ya que el viaje le es muy largo y cansado, causando que pierda mucho tiempo en conseguir su mercadería. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, y sabe que tiene que pagarlo a tiempo y está dispuesta a hacerlo, en su banco comunal es muy responsable, siempre está pendiente de que se cumplan los acuerdos a los que llegan entre socias. Con los 500 soles que solicita comprará más juguetes para implementar mejor su tienda y así ofrecer una mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Elena is 29 years old. She is a very happy woman. She lives in her family's house with her only daughter Maira, who is 9 years old. Her greatest desire in life is to give Maira a good life, even if she has to work a lot to make it possible. Elena has a vending station in the San José market (a large market in the city of Juliaca) where she sells toys. She is very happy with her business, seeing it's quite profitable. She has been in this business for two years. The thing she likes most is seeing children's happy faces when they are holding one of her toys, as she has always loved children. This is also the reason she decided to start this business. In future, Elena hopes to have a larger shop where she can sell many more toys. To do this, she knows she must work very hard and without breaks. The most difficult aspect of Elena's work is transporting the toys from the city of Tacna (a city in the south of Peru, near the border with Chile), seeing the trip is very long and tiring. As such, it takes a lot of time to acquire her merchandise. This is Elena's second loan with MFP [Kiva partner]. She understands that she needs to pay it back on time and is prepared to do so. Elena is a very responsible member of her community bank. She always makes sure agreements among members are fully met. She plans to use the requested loan of 500 soles [about US $175] to purchase more toys in order to improve how her shop operates and, in doing so, provide greater variety to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Todd M. Anderson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To expand merchandise on offer

loans.name: Muslima

texts.ru: Муслима торгует кондитерскими изделиями на центральном рынке города Исфары. Ей 43 года, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Несколько лет назад потеряла свою работу и стала выходить на рынок торговать. Вначале работала по найму, постепенно накопив свой капитал, стала самостоятельно вести бизнес. Сейчас она уже имеет стабильный бизнес и своих постоянных поставщиков и клиентов. Муслима планирует немного расширить наименование своих товаров и поэтому подает заявку на займ в КИВА.
texts.en:
Muslima sells confectionary products in the central market in the town of Isfara. She is 43 years old, married and has three children. Several years ago, she lost her job and went into sales in the marketplace. In the beginning, she worked for wages while gradually saving her money. She then went into business for herself. Today, she has a stable business with regular suppliers and customers. Muslima plans to slightly increase her assortment of goods and has applied to Kiva for a loan to do so.

Translated from Russian by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business expansion

loans.name: Saida Alicia

texts.es:
Saida es socia del Banco Comunal Palmeras.
Saida es soltera, tiene 21 años y vive con sus padres, Saida vende cebiche de manera ambulatoria en el estadio de su distrito, actividad que realiza los días sábados y domingos, también en época de fiestas vende comida típica. Además Saida vende cosméticos por catálogos que ofrece a amigos y familiares.
Saida necesita un préstamo de 600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de carne de cerdo.
Los sueños de Saida son tener un puesto estable en el mercado, culminar sus estudios de enfermería.
texts.en:
Saida is a member of the Palmeras [Palm trees] Community Bank. She is single, 21 years old and lives with her parents. Saida is a street vendor. On Saturdays and Sundays she sells cebiche [raw fish served in lemon or lime juice, onion, salt and garlic] at her district's stadium. She also sells traditional foods during holiday seasons. In addition, Saida sells cosmetics by taking catalogue orders from friends and family members. Saida needs a loan of 600 soles [about US $200], which she will invest in the purchase of pork. Saida's dreams are to have a permanent stand in the market and to complete her nursing studies.

Translated from Spanish by Todd M. Anderson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of pork

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es: Ysabel tiene 40 años, es una madre muy amorosa, vive en su propia casa junto a sus 3 hijos; Roxana de 17, Freddy de 14 y Jhon de 12 años y lo que más desea es darles una buena educación. La crianza de ganado le ha resultado un negocio muy rentable, puesto que sus reses son muy solicitas en las ferias dominicales de Huancane y Juliaca, ella cría con mucho amor a sus animales, desde muy temprano los lleva a pastar y siempre está fijándose en que la comida que están ingiriendo sea saludable. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es caminar por los extensos campos en compañía de su ganado, lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y lo que más difícil es llevar sus reses hasta las ferias donde las vende. Para el futuro espera aumentar el número de ganado que tiene actualmente, pero sabe que para eso tiene que trabajar mucho y está dispuesta a hacerlo. Este es el primer préstamo de Ysabel con MFP y promete pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo, puesto que no quiere perjudicar a las demás socias de su banco comunal, donde es muy querida por la alegría que le pone al grupo. Con los 1000 soles que solicita planea comprar un toro, el cual le costará aproximadamente 4000 soles, para ello está dispuesta a poner parte del dinero de sus ahorros para completar el monto necesario.
texts.en:
Ysabel is 40 years old. She is a very loving mother and lives in her own home with her three children: 17-year-old Roxana, 14-year-old Freddy, and 12-year-old Jhon. Her greatest desire is to give them a good education. Raising cattle has become a very profitable business for Ysabel, seeing her cows are in great demand at the Sunday fairs in the towns of Huancane and Juliaca. Ysabel raises her animals with lots of love. She takes them out to pasture really early in the morning and always makes sure their food is good for them. Ysabel's favorite aspect of her work is walking around the vast countryside with her cattle. She has been in this business for 20 years and the most difficult thing is bringing her cows to the fairs for sale. In future Ysabel hopes to increase the number of cattle she has. She knows that, to do this, she must work very hard and is ready to do so. This is Ysabel's first loan with [Kiva partner] MFP and she promises to make all her payments on time, seeing she doesn't want to cause harm for the other members of her community bank, where she is well liked for the joy she brings to the group. Ysabel plans to use the requested 1,000 soles [about US $350] to purchase a bull, which will cost about 4,000 soles. She plans to use part of her savings to cover the remaining cost of the bull.

Translated from Spanish by Todd M. Anderson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a bull

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
Catalina es socia del Banco Comunal Renacer.
Catalina es casada, tiene 34 años y 3 hijos, Catalina viaja a las ferias de la región en donde vende pan, ropa variada y de las ferias compra cereales que luego los comercializa en el mercado de abastos de la ciudad de Ayacucho. Además Catalina tiene una llantería junto a su esposo.
Catalina necesita un préstamo de 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de ropa y neumáticos usados.
Los sueños de Catalina son educar a sus hijos y comprar un carro.
texts.en:
Catalina is a member of the Renacer Community Bank. She is married, 34 years old and has three children. Catalina travels to fairs throughout the region to sell bread and articles of clothing. She also purchases grains at the fairs, which she then sells in the food market in the city of Ayacucho. Catalina and her husband also own a tire shop. Catalina needs a loan of 2,000 soles [about US $675] which she will invest in the purchase of clothing and used tires. Catalina's dreams are to provide an education for her children and purchase a car.

Translated from Spanish by Todd M. Anderson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of clothing and used tires

loans.name: Muhayyo

texts.ru:
В свои 53 года Мухайё продолжает трудиться и заниматься предпринимательством. Для нее это основной источник дохода семьи, так как ее муж тоже работает, но стабильного заработка не имеет. Поэтому Мухайё и ее старший сын торгуют. Сама Мухайё производит дома соленые косточки, которые затем отсылают для продажи за пределы Таджикистана. Технология производства соленых косточек трудоемкая и занимает много времени. Сначала абрикосовые косточки немного раскалывают, а затем варят в специальном соляном растворе. После варки косточки выкладывают тонким слоем на солнце и сушат. Через несколько часов косточки готовы к реализации.
Старший сын Мухайё на центральном рынке торгует различными овощами и это тоже складывается в общий семейный бюджет. 
Мухайё решила получить небольшой займ на расширение своего бизнеса, так как сейчас цены на абрикосовые косточки упали и она хочет сделать небольшой запас для будущего.
texts.en:
53-year-old Muhayyo continues to work and to run a business that is the main source of income for her family. Although her husband also works, he does not have a steady job, and for this reason, Muhayyo and her eldest son are in trade. Muhayyo herself processes the salted apricot pits at home, and then exports them abroad. It is hard work and time-consuming. First, the apricot pits are cracked, then slightly blanched in a special brine. After blanching, the pits are spread out in a thin layer in the sun to dry. The pits are ready for sale in a few hours. Muhayyo's eldest son sells a variety of vegetables in the central market, and this also goes into the family kitty. Since the price of apricot pits has now dropped and she wants to stock up for the future, Muhayyo decided to take out a small loan to expand her business.

Translated from Russian by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of apricot pits

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: Juan Alberto F. de 54 años de edad reside en Apopa junto a su esposa, la cual se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar. Juan posee un taller de reparación de automóviles desde hace 20 años. Juan solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda obtener el dinero para comprar un equipo más avanzado para su taller, debido a que él y su esposa dependen únicamente del taller, Juan desea mejorar sus herramientas de trabajo y poder desempeñar un mejor trabajo lo cual atraiga nuevos clientes. Debido a que Juan no posee otro tipo de ayuda economía él desea poder mejorar su equipo y obtener más ganancias a través de su servicio.
texts.en:
Juan Alberto F. is 54 years old and lives in Apopa with his wife, who takes care of managing the household. Juan has had an auto repair workshop for 20 years. He is requesting a loan for purchase of more advanced equipment for his shop. Because he and his wife derive their only income from the shop, Juan would like to improve his work tools and be able to provide better service. This will help him attract new customers. Seeing Juan has no other means of financial support, he would like to improve his equipment and increase the revenue he earns from providing his services.

Translated from Spanish by Todd M. Anderson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of new workshop equipment

location.town: Apopa en el departamento de San Salvador

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es socia del Banco Comunal Renacer.
Carmen es casada, tiene 55 años y 6 hijos, Carmen viaja a las diferentes ferias D. la región en donD. venD. frutas, verduras y D. las ferias compra cereales que luego comercializa en el mercado D. abastos D. la ciudad D. Ayacucho. Además Carmen venD. leña en su casa.
Carmen necesita un préstamo D. 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. leña, cereales.
Los sueños D. Carmen son brindar una buena educación a sus hijos y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the Banco Comunal Renacer. She is 55 years old, married, and has 6 children. Carmen travels to the region's different fairs to sell fruits and vegetables. She also buys cereals from the fair, which she later sells at the provisions market in the city of Ayacucho. In addition to all this, Carmen also sells wool out of her house. Carmen needs a loan of 2,000 soles, which will be invested in the purchase of wool and cereals. Carmen's dreams are to proviD. a good education to her children and to improve her business.

Translated from Spanish by Kevin Lenhart, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Para la compra de leña, cereales.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es:
Candelaria es socia del Banco Comunal Renacer.
Candelaria es casada, tiene 53 años y 4 hijos, Candelaria tiene cabinas de Internet en su casa, brinda servicios de fotocopiado, también vende golosinas, bebidas. Además por las noches Candelaria vende salchipapas.
Candelaria necesita un préstamo de 1500 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de golosinas, gaseosas, papa y aceite.
Los sueños de Candelaria son ampliar su negocio y construir el segundo piso de su casa.
texts.en:
Candelaria is a member of Village Bank Renacer. Candelaria is married, 53 years old and has four kids. Candelaria has Internet booths in her house, she provides photocopying services, also selling candy and drinks. Furthermore, at night Candelaria sells sliced fried sausage and french fries (salchipapas). Candelaria needs a loan of 1500 soles that will be invested in the purchase of candy, soda, potato, and oil. Candelaria's dream is to expand her business and build a second floor on her home.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Hopkins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase candy, soda, potato and oil.

loans.name: Maria De La Cruz

texts.es: La Sra. Maria de la Cruz M. tiene mas de 10 años de dedicarse a la venta de bicicletas, repuestos y reparaciones de las mismas, durante todo este tiempo le ha ido muy bien , pero como todo negocio a veces tiene sus dificultades, pero poco a poco va saliendo con su esposo adelante, tienen una hija la cual esta estudiando en la universidad, este negocio le genera los ingresos para cubrir con los gastos del hogar y con las obligaciones, ella necesita el credito para poder salir adelante con su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria de la Cruz M. has been selling bicycles and spare parts for over 10 years, also reparing them. Throughout this time she has been doing very well, but like all businesses sometimes there are difficulties, but little by little her and her husband are coming out ahead. They have a daughter who is studying at the university; their business generates income enough to cover household expenses and obligations. She needs a loan to be able to move forward with her business.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Hopkins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy bicycles and spare parts.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Robiyahon

texts.ru: Семья Робияхон состоит из мужа и 2 детей. Ей 37 лет, бизнесом стала заниматься несколько лет назад когда доход семьи стал падать. Работа  в колхозе уже не могла покрыть все расходы семьи, дети росли, и поэтому она решила найти другой источник дохода. Начала она торговать на рынке и тогда имела небольшой оборотный капитал. Постепенно вкладывая часть прибыли в оборотный капитал добилась большей прибыли. Также недавно ей стал помогать ее младший брат и теперь бизнес Робияхон содержит не только ее семью, но и семью брата. Робияхон дополнительно к своим деньгам решила получить небольшой займ и подала заявку на КИВА.
texts.en:
Robiyahon's family includes her husband and two children. She is 37 years old, and went into business several years ago when her family income started to drop, and work on the collective farm could no longer cover all the family expenses. The children were growing and so she decided to find another source of income. When Robiyahon started to trade at the market, she had very little working capital. The gradual reinvestment of a portion of her profits into the company yielded even bigger profits. Also, not long ago her younger brother began to help her, and now he and his family are part of the business as well. Robiyahon decided to take out a small loan to have extra money on hand, and applied to Kiva.

Translated from Russian by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business expansion

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es:
Fortunata es socia del Banco Comunal Renacer.
Fortunata es casada, tiene 40 años y 2 hijos, Fortunata viaja a las diferentes ferias de la región 4 veces por semana, en donde vende abarrotes y de las ferias compra cereales, animales menores. Además Fortunata vende comida típica todos los días sábados y domingos.
Fortunata necesita un préstamo de 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de cerdo y cereales.
Los sueños de Fortunata son que sus hijos culminen sus estudios y mejorar sus negocios.
texts.en:
Fortunata is a member of the Village Bank Renacer. Fortunata is married, 40 years old and has two children. Fortunata travels to different markets in the region four times a week, where she sells groceries and buys grains and small animals. Furthermore Fortunata sells traditional food every saturday and sunday. Fortunata needs a loan of 2000 soles that will be invested in the purchase of pork and grain. Fortunata's dreams are for her children to complete their studies and to improve her business.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Hopkins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase pork and grain.

loans.name: Bexi Yolanda

texts.es: La Sra. Bexi Yolanda G. tiene mas de 2 años de dedicarse a lo que es la venta de ropa y calzado, las ventas las realiza de forma ambulante, domiciliar y en centro de trabajos privados y estatales, ella tiene 4 hijos los cuales estudian en la escuela primaria del barrio en donde ella vive, con los ingresos que le genera este tipo de actividad le sirven para cubrir con los gastos familiares y cumplir con las obligaciones financieras, ella necesita el credito para comprar mas producto ya que ella esta pasando un tiempo dificil y necesita recuperarse.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bexi Yolanda G. has been selling clothing and footwear for more than two years. Sales are made by traveling to customers, to households and in private and public work centers. She has 4 children who are studying in the neighborhood primary school where she lives. Income earned from this activity is used to pay household bills and to meet financial obligations. She needs a loan to buy more products, as she going through a difficult time and needs to recover.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Hopkins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy pants, footwear, skirts and blouses.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es:
Flor es socia del Banco Comunal Renacer.
Flor es casada, tiene 42 años y 4 hijos, Flor junto a su esposo viajan a las ferias D. la región en donD. compra ganado y luego los comercializa en la feria D. San Juan, también benéfica los animales y venD. la carne en un puesto del mercado D. Carmen Alto.
Flor necesita un préstamo D. 1500 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. oveja.
Los sueños D. Flor son tener una bodega en su casa, comprar una cortadora D. carne y educar a su ultimo hijo.
texts.en:
Flor is a member of the communal bank “Renacer.” She is married, 42 years old, and has 4 children. Flor and her husband travel to the region’s fairs to buy cattle and then sell them at San Juan’s fair. They also take care of the animals and sell the meat from a post in the Carmen Alto market. Flor needs a loan of 1500 soles that she will invest in buying sheep. Flor would like to have a store in her house, buy a meat cutter, and give her last son an education.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Para la compra de oveja.

loans.name: Ozodahon

texts.ru:
У Озодахон есть профессия – она швея. Раньше работала в государственном учреждении, но растущие потребности семьи вынудили ее бросить работу и начать свое самостоятельное дело. Она купила несколько швейных машинок, подключила к себе свою дочку и невестку и начала мелкое производство. Озода и ее дочь с невесткой шьют национальные таджикские одеяла – курпачи. Несколько ее клиентов покупают готовые курпачи и затем продают на рынках. Несколько месяцев назад Озода взяла к себе на обучение несколько соседских девочек и стала обучать их мастерству шитья. 
Сейчас у Озоды есть небольшой заказ на курпачи и так как цены на ткани немного упали она решила получить займ на КИВА и закупить ткани.
texts.en:
Ozodahon is a seamstress. Before, she worked for a government agency, but due to increasing needs of her family she had to leave her job and start her own business. She bought several sewing machines, involved her daughter and daughter-in-law, and began a production. Three of them sew traditional Tajik blankets - "kurpachi". Several of her clients purchase kurpachi and them resell them at different markets. A few months ago, Ozoda took several neighboring girls as trainees and began teaching them how to sew. Currently, Ozodahon has an good sized outstanding order. Because of a recent drop in textile prices, she decided to obtain a loan from KIVA and purchase large amounts of textiles.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase textiles

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth U. D. Campos D. 43 años D. edad resiD. en Ilopango junto a su hija y su esposo. Ella tiene cuatro años D. poseer una tienda en la cual comercializa productos perecederos como pan, bebidas, galletas entre otros más. Ruth desea obtener un préstamo a través del cual pueda aumentar los productos D. su negocio tales como detergentes, harinas, cereales y más, esto con el fin D. aumentas sus ventas y  poder mejorar su economía familiar, ya que ella desea poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y D. la misma manera ayudar a su hija con sus estudias para que pueda obtener un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Ruth U. D. Campos is 43 years of age, and lives in Ilopango together with her daughter and her husband. For four years she has owned a store in which she sells perishable items like bread, drinks, and chicken, among other things. Ruth hopes to obtain a loan through which she could add new products to her store, such as detergents, flour, grains and more. This would result in greater sales for her, and would enable her to improve her family's finances. This is important to Ruth, since she hopes to be able to help her husband with the household expenses, and at the same time help her daughter with her studies so that she can obtain a better future for herself.

Translated from Spanish by Kevin Lenhart, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de productos perecederos

loans.name: Ashurhon

texts.ru:
В центре города расположен салон красоты «Бону» что в переводе с таджикского означает «Прекрасная женщина». Этот салон принадлежит Ашурхон. Ей 34 года, замужем и имеет 4 детей. Муж занимается перевозками людей, а Ашурхон оказывает услуги по украшиванию невест. Эта услуга включает в себя весь спектр услуг: от создания прически до подбора платья и сдачи его в аренду. Те девушки которые выходят замуж заранее записываются к Ашурхон и в назначенный день приехав к ней делают себе прическу макияж и одевают свадебное платье. Ашурхон довольна своей работой и считает, что дарить людям радость это прекрасно!
Для расширения своей деятельности Ашурхон решила получить небольшой займ на КИВА.
texts.en:
Located downtown is a beauty salon called Bonu, which is Tajik for "beautiful woman." This salon belongs to Ashurhon. She is 34 years old, married and has four children. Her husband is in personal transportation, and Ashurhon provides bridal services. These services run the gamut from styling hair to selection and renting of a gown. The girls who are planning to marry make an appointment in advance with Ashurhon and come to her on the day of the wedding to have their hair and make-up done, and to put on their wedding dresses. Ashurhon enjoys her work and feels that making people happy is great. Ashurhon decided to take out a small loan with Kiva to expand her business.

Translated from Russian by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business expansion

loans.name: Maria Alejandrina

texts.es:
Maria es socia del Banco Comunal Solución.
Maria es casada, tiene 56 años y 5 hijos, Maria viaja  a las diferentes ferias D. la región  en donD. venD. verduras, frutas, carne, dependiendo D. la demanda, tambien venD. comida y D. las ferias compra cereales, papa, productos que venD. en la ciudad D. Ayacucho D. casa en casa.
Maria necesita un préstamo D. 1050 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. arroz, azúcar.
Maria sueña con comprar un carro para que su hijo trabaje y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Solution Communal Bank. María is married, 56 years old, and has five children. She travels to the various markets in the region where she sells vegetables, fruit, and meat, depending on the demand. She also sells food and when at the market she buys cereal grains, potatoes, and products that she can sell in Ayacucho door-to-door. María needs a loan of 1,050 soles, money which will be invested in the purchase of rice and sugar. She dreams of buying a car, so her son can work, and of improving her home.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy rice and sugar

loans.name: Mastura

texts.ru: Мастурахон работает медицинской сестрой в центре здоровья джамоата Хонобод, что расположен в Исфаринском районе. Каждый день 5 дней в неделю с утра до вечера она работает, а по выходным дням работает у себя в огороде дома. Мастурахон 37 лет, замужем и имеет 3 детей. Муж работает в колхозе. Дополнительно к своим занятиям супруги занимаются откормом скота. Сейчас у них 2 коровы и 1 бычок. Откорм скота приносит супругам основную часть дохода семьи, так как молоко получаемое от коров частью используется в питании семьи а излишки продают соседям, а бычки после прироста продаются на рынке. Дополнительно к скоту, имеющемуся дома, Мастурахон хочет приобрести еще одного бычка, и поэтому подала заявку на займ на КИВА.
texts.en:
Mastura works as a nurse a health center in the Khonabad municipality. She works from morning to night every day, five days per week and spends weekends working on her home garden. Mastura is 37 years old, married and has 3 children. Her husband works at a collective farm. In addition to their jobs, the husband and wife are involved in livestock feeding. They currently own 2 cows and 1 bull. Cattle feeding business is the primary income source for the family because milk is either used in the family’s diet or sold to neighbors, and bulls, once grown, are sold at a market. Mastura wants to purchase one more bull in addition to the cattle they own at home. This is why she requested this loan from Kiva.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a bull

loans.name: Maria Rocio

texts.es:
Maria es es socia del Banco Comunal Solución.
Maria es casada, tiene 33 años y 1 hija, Maria tiene un puesto en el mercado de la Magdalena en donde vende jugos de frutas, además Maria junto a su esposo tienen carros y brindan servicio de transporte y también llevan papa, tuna dependiendo de la demanda. 
Maria necesita un préstamo de 2550 soles dinero que será invertido como parte de pago de una cisterna.
Maria sueña con comprar otra casa, tener mas carros y que su hija sea profesional.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Solution Communal Bank. She is married, 33 years old, and has one daughter. María has a stall at the Magdalena Market where she sells fruit juices. María, alongside her husband, also sells cars and they have a transportation service and sometimes transport potatoes or cactus pears depending on the demand. María needs a loan of 2,550 soles, money which will be used as part of the payment for a cistern. She dreams of buying another house, having more cars, and that her daughter will one day be a professional.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a cistern

loans.name: Xiomara Soveida

texts.es: la Sra. Xiomara U. se dedica desde hace 4 años a la venta de produtos de uso personal y quiere invertir en comprar topa tambien, estos dos negocios le ayudaran a traer ingresos para el hogar y asi contribuir con los gastos del mismo, ella se siente muy motivada por su trabajo ya que siente que todo le esta saliendo bien, ella tiene muchas ganas de superarse, ella es madre de una niña de 4 años la cual esta en el kinder de la colonia en la que vive y su esposo trabaja de albañil lo que le permite a los dos reunir el dinero para salir adelante con su hogar,
texts.en:
Mrs. Xiomara U. has worked selling personal products for four years and wants to buy clothing as well. These two businesses will help her bring incoming into her home and contribute to the household expenses. She feels very motivated to work because everything is working out well. She has a great desire to better herself. She is the mother of a 4-year old girl who is in kindergarten in the neighborhood where she lives, and her husband works as a bricklayer which allows them to combine their money to help their household get ahead.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy creams, deodorants, lotions, shampoos, and air fresheners

loans.name: Rotifa

texts.ru: Ротифа и ее сестры предприниматели. На центральном рынке они имеют торговый прилавок, где они продают кондитерские изделия: пряники, кексы, печенье и тп. Ротифе 45 лет, замужем и имеет 2 детей. Муж нигде не работает и также помогает жене в ее торговле. Кондитерские изделия приобретаю здесь же на рынке у оптовиков. А за несколькими наименованиями изделий ездят на оптовые рынки в соседние рынки. Ротифа планирует увеличить товарооборот и поэтому хочет получить займ на КИВА.
texts.en:
Rotifa and her sisters are entrepreneurs. They have a shop at the central market where they sell sweets: gingerbread, muffins, cookies, etc. Rotifa is 45 years old, is married and has 2 children. Her husband does not have a job and also helps his wife with her business. They purchase the sweets at the same market from wholesalers. For several branded goods they travel to wholesale markets in neighboring markets. Rotifa plans to increase her turnover and because of this would like to get a loan on KIVA.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase turnover

loans.name: Wassilatou

texts.fr: O. wassilatou est une femme mariée et a 02 enfants.  Elle habite avec sa famille au quartier de NUKAFU qui est un quartier périphérique de la ville de Lomé. Elle exerce comme activité génératrice de revenus, la vente de matériels électriques, de CD et divers. Elle est une dame très dynamique parce qu’il est rare de voir une femme exercer ce genre d’activité, la qualité de son accueil fait qu’elle conquiert chaque jour de nouveaux clients. Elle veut agrandir son stock de marchandises actuel pour vendre plus. Elle sollicite alors de WAGES un crédit pour acheter des matériaux électriques, 05 cartons de CD et divers. Avec son revenu elle aide son mari dans les charges du foyer.
texts.en:
Wassilatou O. is a married woman with two children. She lives with her family in the Nukafu district which is an outlying area of the town of Lomé. She sells electronic materials, CDs, and such. She is a very energetic lady as it is rare to see a woman in this sort of business. Her welcoming attitude allows her to win over new customers daily. She wants to expand her stock of merchandise so as to make more sales. She is requesting a loan from WAGES to buy electrical materials, 5 cases of CDs, and various other items. With her income, she will help her husband cover household expenses.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase of electrical materials and CDs for re-sale

loans.name: Harimabonu

texts.ru: Харимахон и ее муж работают в местном колхозе. Заработную плату получают безналично продуктами питания. Чтобы обеспечить семью супруги дополнительно занимаются откормом скота. Харимахон 55 лет, у нее 3 детей. Харимахон планирует купить одного бычка и хочет получить займ.
texts.en:
Harimabonu and her husband work at a local collective farm. They are not paid in cash but rather in food products. In order to support the family, the husband and wife are involved in livestock feeding. Harimabonu is 55 years old and has 3 children. She plans to obtain the loan in order to purchase one bull.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a bull

loans.name: Bessy Arleny

texts.es: la Sra. Bessy G. tiene una pulperia desde hace 4 años la cual opera bajo el nombre de Pulperia IVA, su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion. ella es casada y es madre de un niño, este negocio le ha permitido generar ingresos sin tener que descuidar a su hijo y ni los que haceres de la casa, su esposo trabaja en la aduana de las manos frontera con Nicaragua, ella nos conto muy alegre que su negocio es de gran bendicion ya que todo le ha salido muy bien y lo que ella necesita en este momento es surtir mas su negocio ya que esta creciendo muy rapido y necesita cubrir con todas las demanadas de sus clientes
texts.en:
Mrs. Bessy G. has owned a general store for four years, which operates under the name of IVA General Store. The business is located inside her home. She is married and is the mother of a boy. The business allows her to generate income without having to leave her son or the household duties. Her husband works for the customs agency on the Nicaraguan border. She told us that she is very happy that her business is such a blessing, as everything has gone very well and that right now she needs to better stock the business. It is growing very rapidly and she needs to meet the demands of all of her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy soft drinks, paper, coffee, rice, beans, bread, cookies, soups, churros, and soap

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rina

texts.es:
Rina es socia del Banco Comunal Solución.
Rina es conviviente, tiene 35 años y 3 hijos, Rina tiene una bodega en su casa en donde vende abarrotes en general, verduras, frutas. Además Rina tiene cabinas de Internet actividad que realiza con la ayuda de su hijo, también vende útiles de escritorio.
Rina necesita un préstamo de 3000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar, fideo, leche.
Rina sueña con construir su casa, mejorar su casa y aumentar su negocio.
texts.en:
Rina is a member of the Solution Communal Bank. She lives with her partner, is 35 years old, and has three children. Rina has a small grocery store in her home where she sells general groceries, vegetables, and fruits. In addition, Rina has an internet café, which she runs with the help of her son. She also sells school supplies. Rina needs a loan of 3,000 soles, which she will invest in the purchase of rice, sugar, noodles and milk. Rina dreams of building a house, improving her home, and expanding her business.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy rice, sugar, noodles and milk

loans.name: Eudosia

texts.es:
Eudosia es socia del Banco Comunal Solución.
Eudosia es conviviente, tiene 49 años y 1 hijo, Eudosia tiene una tienda en su casa en donde vende abarrotes en general actividad que realiza todos los días con la ayuda de su hija. Además Eudosia viaja a las ferias de la región en donde compra cereales que luego vende en los mercados de la ciudad de Ayacucho.
Eudosia necesita un préstamo de 1200 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar, jabón, detergente
Los sueños de Eudosia son mejorar su casa y educar a su hija.
texts.en:
Eudosia is a member of the Solution Communal Bank. Eudosia is a common-law wife, is 49 years old, and has one child. She has a store in her home where she sells general groceries every day with the help of her daughter. In addition, Eudosia travels to the regional markets where she buys cereal grains, which she then sells in the markets in the city of Ayacucho. Eudosia needs a loan of 1,200 soles, which she will invest in the purchase of rice, sugar, soap and detergent. Eudosia dreams of improving her house and of educating her daughter.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy rice, sugar, soap, and detergent

loans.name: Olimchon

texts.ru: Олимчон работает в колхозе рядовым работником. Ему 57 лет, женат. Даже по меркам вотсока он считается многодетным отцом – у него 6 детей. Старшие выросли и уже помогают отцу и матери. Кроме работы в колхозе Олимчон еще занимается откормом скота. Сейчас у него есть несколько голов крупного рогатого скота и баранов. За ними ухаживают его жена и старшие дочери (на фото его старшая дочь). Олимчон дополнительно собирается приобрести еще одного бычка и корм для него. Недавно он подал заявку на КИВА.
texts.en:
Olimchon works in a collective farm as a common worker. He is 57 years old, he is married. Even by the middle eastern standards he is considered a father of many children - he has six. His older children have already grown up and are helping their mother and father. Beside his job at the farm Olimchon also feeds cattle. Right now he has several heads of cattle and sheep. His wife and older daughters are taking care of the cattle (his older daughter is on the photo). Additionally, Olimchon plans to buy one more calf and fodder. He has recently applied for a loan at Kiva.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a calf and fodder

loans.name: Isidoro

texts.es: El Sr. Isidoro S. G. tiene un pequeño taller de satreria hace 23 años, este opera bajo el nombre de Satreria S., su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion y es atendido por el y su esposa donde confeccionan ropa de varon y de damas para toda ocacion siendo una de las especialidades los pantalones y camisas de varon. el Sr. S. es muy conocido por su espiritu de superacion y conducta moral, honestidad, en este momento nos comento que este oficio le ha generado los ingresos en su hogar para poder sacar adelante a su familia dandoles estudio a sus hijos que hoy en dia son profesionales.
texts.en:
Mr. Isidoro S. G. has had a small tailor shop for 23 years which operates under the name of S. Tailor Shop. His business is located in his home and is run by him and his wife where they make clothing for men and women for all occasions. Their specialties are pants and shirts for men. Mr. S. is very well known for his spirit of self-improvement and his moral conduct and honesty. He told us that this profession has generated the income for his home to be able to move his family ahead, educating his children so that today they are professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fabric and sewing accessories

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth es socia del Banco Comunal Solución.
Elizabeth es conviviente, tiene 3 hijos, Elizabeth se dedica a la agricultura de verduras en sus tierras de Compañía, sus productos los vende en el M. de abastos de la ciudad de Ayacucho. Además Elizabeth junto a su esposo se dedican a la fabricación de ladrillos artesanales.
Elizabeth necesita un préstamo de 900 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de tierra.
Elizabeth sueña con tener un puesto en el M. de abastos, comprar un terreno y construir su casa.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the community bank "Solution". She is married with three children. Elizabeth's job is to grow vegetables from the land. She sells her products in the food market in the city of Ayacucho. Moreover, Elizabeth works together with her husband to make handcrafted bricks. Elizabeth needs a loan of 900 sols to invest in the purchase of land. Her dream is to have her own stand in the food market, buy an estate, and build her own house.

Translated from Spanish by Brittany Thatcher, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase land

loans.name: Yecenia

texts.es: La Sra. Yecenia G. es propietaria de una carniceria desde hace 5 años, operando bajo el nombre de carniceria JULITO, ofreciendole a sus clientes una variedad de productos, y que tienen una norma en calidad de higiene establecido por la region sanitaria. el producto que ella vende lo compra en el rastro municipal el cual es supervisado por el ministerio de salud. La Sra. G. esta casada y tiene un hija en edad escolar, ella asisite a un centro educativo publico, su esposo trabaja en Estados Unidos de norteamerica desde hace mas de 6 año, con los ingresos que le genera la carniceria ella cubre con los gastos familiares y personales y con las aportaciones que mendualmente envia su esposo esta construyendo su casa de habitacion. el credito lo necesita para invertirlo en su caarniceria.
texts.en:
Yecenia G. has been the owner of a meat market for the past 5 years, operating under the name of "Carniceria JULITO". She offers a variety of products to her customers who require a high standard of quality in this health conscious region. The product that she sells in the city market is regulated by the health minister. Mrs. G. is married and has a daughter who attends the city's public school. Her husband has worked in the United States for more than 6 years. With the income from her meat market, she is able to cover the household and personal bills. With the monthly contribution she receives from her husband, she is building a home. She needs a loan to invest in her meat market.

Translated from Spanish by Brittany Thatcher, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase beef

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Kodzo

texts.fr: Monsieur A. est un résident du quartier de hedrzanawoè à Lomé, il est veuf et a 03 enfants à sa charge, pour subvenir à leurs besoins il a commencé le commerce des articles de friperie dans le marché de Cokétimé, il s’approvisionne au marché de hedzranawoé où le commerce de friperie est très développé. Voulant agrandir son commerce pour réaliser plus de profit et mieux subvenir aux charges de sa famille, il demande à WAGES son premier crédit pour acheter 01 balle de vêtements pour enfant, 01 balle de chemise et 02 balles de pantalons.
texts.en:
Mr. A. is a resident of the district of Hedrzanawoè in Lomé. He is a widower raising 3 children, and to support them, he began selling used clothing in the market of Cokétimé. He buys his merchandise in the market of Hedzranawoé where the buying and selling of used clothing is a big business. Wishing to expand his business so as to make more profit and thus support his family better, he is requesting his first loan from WAGES to buy one bale of children's clothing, one bale of shirts, and two bales of pants.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase of used clothing for re-sale

loans.name: Santos Angel

texts.es:
el Sr. Santos G. se dedica a la venta de golosinas desde hace 2 años, su cafeteria la tiene dentro de una escuela llamada Jose Trinidad Reyes. que esta ubicada en la misma aldea.
el es casado y tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 dependen de el. ella tiene la ayuda de su esposa que es la que le elabora las golosinas que vende como ser tacos, enchiladas, tortillas con quesillo, catrachitas, tajaditas de platano, platanos con frijoles y mantequilla y otras. el es el encargado de recibir el diner, ellos cubren un 100% todos los gastos de su hogar con los ingresos que les deja su negocio, el necesita el credito para poder invertir mas en su negocio ya que no se da abasto con tanto cliente.
texts.en:
Mr. Santos G. has made a living by selling snacks for the past two years. His cafe is inside a school named "Jose Trinidad Reyes", which is located in his town. He is married with three children, two of whom still financially depend on him. He has the help of his wife who makes the snacks, such as tacos, enchiladas, quesadillas, nachos, banana chips, and bananas with beans, butter, and more. He is in charge of earning the money; they cover 100% of their household bills with the income from their business. He needs this loan to invest in his business so that he can accomodate more customers.

Translated from Spanish by Brittany Thatcher, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase drinks, churros, cheese, butter, tortillas, chicken, pork, flour, beans, and bananas.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru: Матлуба имеет небольшой магазинчик около школы и продает там различные школьные принадлежности: тетради, ручки, карандаши и тп. Также кроме канцелярских товаров дополнительно там же имеются сладости, печенье и тп. Кроме самой Матлубы ей помогают ее старшая дочь и невестка. Матлубе 54 года. Замужем, у нее 6 детей. Она собирается немного расширить ассортимент товаров и если получится открыть вторую точку для своей дочери, поэтому собирается получить займ КИВА.
texts.en:
Matluba has a small shop close to a school, where she sells various school supplies: notebooks, pens, pencils, etc. Besides school supplies, she also sells snacks and candy. He elder daughter and daughter-in-law help her with this business. Matluba is 54 years old. She is married and has 6 children. She plans to use KIVA loan to increase her inventory and open up a second shop for her daughter.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To expand business/ open a second store

loans.name: Nigina

texts.ru: Муж Нигины (на фото)занимается куплей продажей скота, а Нигина помогает ему ухаживать за скотом дома. Оба супруга работают в колхозе. Нигине 33 года, ее мужу тоже, имеют 4 детей. Доход от купли и продажи скота является дополнительным источником дохода. Нигина знает о программе кредитования КИВА и поэтому решила получить займ для расширения своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Nigina and her husband, who is featured on this photo, work on a collective farm. Nigina also helps her husband tend to the cattle. The profit from cattle sales is their additional source of income. Nigina and her husband are 33 years old and have four children. Nigina knows about Kiva and decided to apply for a loan that would allow her expand her business.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: business expansion

loans.name: Rafiya

texts.ru: Рафия не имеет постоянной работы и поэтому откармливает домашний скот дома. У нее 2 коровы и несколько баранов. Ее муж работает в колхозе, а по выходным дням выходит на скотные рынки. Если попадается дешевый скот он покупает и приводит домой. Несколько недель Рафия ухаживает за ним, и затем ее муж продает на рынке. Прибыль покрывает многие расходы семьи. Рафия собирается приобрести еще одного бычка и поэтому подала заявку на займ КИВА.
texts.en:
Rafiya does not have a permanent job. Therefore she raises cattle. She has two cows and a few sheep. Rafiya's husband works for a collective farm. On the weekends, he sells cattle at cattle markets. If he finds cheap cattle, he buys it and bring it home. For a few weeks, Rafiya tends to the cattle and then her husband sells it at the market. The profit covers of their expenditures. Rafiya has applied for a Kiva loan because she would like to purchase another bull calf.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase a bull calf

loans.name: Grupo Plaza Group

texts.es:
el grupo plaza es un grupo con integrantes jovenes y muy unidos que tienen muchas ganas de superarse, este grupo se conforma de la siguiente manera:
Christian Daniel M. de 23 años de edad que es el cordinador del grupo, este muchacho se dedica a la venta de ropa interior, camisas, blusas, zapatos y juguetes, el vende estos productos en la colonia que recide y tambien viaja los fines de semana junto con la mama al departamento de Olancho en la zona del mercado de campamento, el tiene mas de 5 años de dedicarse a las ventas con este proceso se ayuda a cubrir los gastos que tiene en la universidad. 
 La Sra. Norma Catalina R. de 36 años de edad quien es una muchacha emprendedora, es madre soltera con 4 hijos de los cuales 2 ya estan grandes y dos estudian, ella se a dedicado a la costura de ropa interior y sabanas, tiene mas de 6 años de dedicarse a este rubro, esta actividad le ha ayudado a salir adelante con su familia. 
El SR. Kany S. de 21 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de lociones, estuches de reloj, ropa interior y camisas para hombres ya sean formales o sports, el se dedica a esto para poder ayudar a su madre con los gastos, el tiene mas de tres años de dedicarse a las ventas , con el dinero piensa invertir mas para tener una mejor utilidad y crecer como comerciante. todos ellos son personas emprendedoras y muy colaboradoras.
texts.en:
The plaza group has young members who are very united and have the motivation to improve themselves. This group is comprised of the following members: Christian Daniel M. is 23 years old and is the coordinator of the group. He sells undergarments, shirts, blouses, shoes, and toys for a living. He sells these products in the town where he lives and he travels on the weekends with his mother to the Olancho district, where the central market is located. He has been doing this activity for more than 5 years in order to cover his bills for university education. Norma Catalina R. is 36 years old. She is an entreprenuer and a single mother of four children, two of whom are adults and two of whom are still in school. She has been making undergarments and sheets for more than 6 years. This job has allowed her family to improve their circumstances. Kany S. is 21 years old and sells lotions, watch boxes, undergarments, and men's shirts (formal or casual). He has this job in order to help his mother with the household bills. He has had this job for over 3 years. With this loan, he would like to invest in tools to help him grow as a business man. They are all entrepreneurs and team players.

Translated from Spanish by Brittany Thatcher, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase men's and women's clothing, watch boxes, and undergarments

loans.name: Mujeres Triufadoras Group

texts.es: El grupo Mujeres Trinfadoras, son mujeres  responsables con deseos de salir adelante vecinas cercanas con experiencia crediticia, Doña MARTHA  es la lider del grupo, tiene 52 años de edad,  tiene veinte  años de dedicarse a su negocio  venta de Productos Flushing , sus clientes son su vecinos asi mismo tiene clientes fijos a los que le hacen los pedidos por catalagos, como ser cremas, balsamos para piernas, lociones de dama,varon Shampo variados, gelatinas, desodorantes, cremas faciales,vajillas, Calcetines ella necesita el credito para comprar cameras, ropa interior bikines, boxer,es muy amable querida por su vercinos,los cuales la visitan para comprarle la cliente invierte mensual $ 500,00 y gana y gana $ 250,00 su sueño es poder tener su negocio mas grande HAYDEE, tiene 53 años de edad, 18 meses de dedicarse a su negocio es madre soltera de su negocio depende su nieto ya que su hijo esta en los Estados unidos trabajando  y ella lo cuida ya que ella tiene su pulperia donde vende productos como ser frijoles, pan, harina, manteca, aceite, arroz, espaguetti, salsa, margarina,churros, café,azucar sus clientes son sus vecinos y personas que transitan el lugar , la cliente invierte a la semana $ 500,00 gana $ 100,00 necesita el credito para comprar mas productos, maiz,frijoles café , carnes rojas, lacteos como ser mantequilla. quesillo, es una señora sociable, es agradable platicar con ella,su sueño es convertir su pulperia en un mercadito XIOMARA  tiene 31 años de edad,  tiene seis años de dedicarse a vender frutas y verduras como ser repollos, pepinos, yuca,papas, zanahoria, patastes,sandia mango,melon,minimos y granos basicos como ser arroz,frijoles jabon ,café azucar,etc. La cliente comenzo a vender con su esposo en una  carreta y ahora ya tienen un local el cual esta bien surtido  tienen bastante demanda ya que estan ubicado en lugar estrategico cuenta con una empleada a cual le pagan $ 90,00 mensuales, la cliente compra sus productos en un mercado local invierte mensualmente $ 1,400,00 y gana  $ 400,00, ella necesita elcredito para comprar frescos, carnes, queso, maiz, ya que ella no cuenta con estos productos, el sueño de la cliente es terminar su casa ya que de las utilidades que le genera el negocio la van haciendo poco a poco.
texts.en:
The group "Winning Women" is comprised of responsible women that desire to improve their lives as close neighbors with credit history. Martha is the leader of the group. She is 52 years old and has dedicated twenty years to her business of Flushing Product sales. Her customers are her neighbors and others that order catalog products, including creams, balms, women's lotions, men's shampoo, gels, deorderants, facial creams, and beauty tools. She needs a loan to buy cameras, underwear, and boxers. She is very friendly with her neighbors who purchase her products. She invests 500,00 each month and profits 250,00. Her dream is to have a bigger business. Haydee is 53 years old and has dedicated herself to her business for 18 months. She is a single mother and her grandson depends on her financially because her son is in the United States working. She has a food stand that sells products such as beans, bread, butter, flour, oil, rice, spaghetti, sauce, margerine, churros, coffee, and sugar. Her customers are her neighbors and others who travel by. Her customers spend 500,00 each week at her store and she profits 100,00. She needs a loan in order to purchase more products such as corn, beans, coffee, red meat, and dairy products. She is social and pleasant woman. Her dream is to turn her food stand into a small market. Xiomara is 31 years old. She has 6 years of experience selling fruits and vegetables such as cabbage, cucumber, yucca, potatoes, carrots, watermelon, mango, cantelope, and basic items such as rice, beans, soap, coffee, sugar, and more. With her husband, she started selling groceries in a car and now she has a small market that is well stocked. They have a sufficient demand because they are located in a strategic place. Her customers spend 90,00 monthly. She purchases her products in a market, investing 1,400,00 each month and profiting 400,00. She needs a loan in order to purchase fresh food, meats, cheeses, and corn because she does not already have these products. Her dream is to move out of her house because she has been making more and more money from her business.

Translated from Spanish by Brittany Thatcher, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy merchandise

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Oishahon

texts.ru: Бизнес Оишахон развивается и одним из ее достижений является подключение к этому виду бизнеса ее старшей дочери. Оишахон помогла ей с арендой торговой точки, научила нюансам бизнеса и сейчас ее дочь успешно работает. Оишахон по прежнему занимается куплей продажей зелени. Сейчас сезон продажи зелени и Оишахон каждый день в 4 утра выезжает на оптовый рынок в город Худжанд (100 километров) за товаром. К 7 утра она уже раскладывает товар на прилавке, а кроме этого раздает оптом тут же на рынке. Прибыль остается нормальная и Оишахон надеется что сможет улучшить свои социальные условия жизни.
texts.en:
Oishahon’s business is developing. One of her achievements has been including her oldest daughter. Oishahon has helped her with rent for her shop and has taught her the nuances of the business, so now her daughter successfully works in sales. Oishahon works buying and selling greens. Now is the season to sell greens, so Oishahon leaves every morning at 4am to buy goods at the wholesale market in Khujand (100 kilometers away). By 7am, she already has the goods displayed on the counter, and additionally she sells goods wholesale there and then in the market. Her profit is average, and Oishahon hopes that she can improve their living conditions.

Translated from Russian by Melissa Kniazeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To expand the business

loans.name: María Esther

texts.es: María Esther N. de 54 años de edad reside en Ciudad Delgado junto a sus cuatro hijos los cuales dependen totalmente de ella, así también junto a su esposo. Ella posee una panadería en la cual trabaja junto a su esposo elaborando el pan, María solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda obtener el capital necesario para comprar harina y manteca para la elaboración del pan, lo que más desea María es poder obtener mayores ganancias y mejorar su economía familiar ya que todos dependen de dicha panadería y e necesario poder suplir a través de esta todas las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
María Esther N. is 54 years old and resides in Delgado City with husband and four sons whom she supports entirely. She has a bread shop that she works at with her husband. Maria would like a loan in order to obtain the necessary capital to purchase flour and butter for bread making. What Maria desires the most is to earn higher profits and improve the economic well being of her family, all of whom depend on the bread shop to meet their household financial obligations.

Translated from Spanish by Brittany Thatcher, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase flour and butter

location.town: Ciudad Delgado en el departamento de San  Salvador

loans.name: Shahlohon

texts.ru: В свои 34 года Шахлохон уже имеет 4 детей. Муж работает в колхозе, дополнительно занимается разными видами бизнеса. Шахлохон воспитывает детей дома, кроме этого занимается откормом скота дома. Так как она с детства знает как выращивать скот сейчас это у нее не вызывает затруднений. Скот растет быстро и приносит хорошую прибыль. Сейчас она планирует приобрести маленького бычка и просит займ для этого.
texts.en:
